name: 張玉鈍
objective:
本課程旨在探討ERP之觀念、架構、要素與管理課題。The course is concerned with concepts, framework, elements, and managerial issues of ERP.　　
本課程將以標竿ERP軟體實作為基礎，認識企業資源規劃之架構組成與企業基本流程，進而探討與ERP相關之管理課題, 如 Business models， Business Process Models， Production system selection ，ERP selection， ERP implementation project ，ERP vs. SCM， Business intelligence 等。
。 
The course will introduce the framework and elements of ERP and fundamental business processes through the actual practice on a benchmark ERP package. The managerial issues related to ERP such as Business models， Business Process Models， Production system selection ，ERP selection， ERP implementation project ，ERP vs. SCM， Business intelligence will be covered.
